tool_description: Generates comprehensive performance reports for social media activities including metrics analysis, growth trends, and actionable insights.

report_type.description: Type of report to generate (daily, weekly, monthly, campaign, annual)

platforms.description: Platforms to include in the report

start_date.description: Report period start date in ISO 8601 format

end_date.description: Report period end date in ISO 8601 format

include_metrics.description: Specific metrics to include (reach, engagement, growth, conversions)

export_format.description: Export format for the report (pdf, excel, json)

error_messages: Invalid report type: Must be one of [daily, weekly, monthly, campaign, annual]
Invalid date range: End date must be after start date and in valid ISO 8601 format
Invalid platforms: Each platform must be one of [facebook, instagram, twitter, linkedin, tiktok, youtube]
Invalid metrics: Each metric must be one of [reach, engagement, growth, conversions]
Invalid export format: Format must be one of [pdf, excel, json]
Insufficient data: Not enough data available for the specified period
usage: Specify report_type, platforms, and date range to generate performance reports. Customize with specific metrics, comparison options, and export format as needed.

report_id.description: Unique identifier for the generated report

growth_percentage.description: Overall growth percentage for the period

recommendations.description: Actionable recommendations based on performance data

report_url.description: URL to download the complete report
